name: Airport Security Guard
summary:
Scan fast
Time’s ticking ⏱️, the line’s a mess, and someone might’ve stuffed a bomb 💣 in their bag… or under their clothes. Fire up the X-ray, scan the luggage and the passengers. Let them through — or not?

{"height":532,"type":"video","width":1280}

Clear the passengers
Search hats, shoes, and pockets for bubble guns 🫧🔫, fireworks💥 or even a bomb!💣 and other absurd contraband. Catch them — or they board!

Unmask the weirdos
